summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 8 requirements from the BuildRequest. The e-commerce store includes product catalog with search/filtering, product detail pages, shopping cart with persistence, checkout flow with validation, admin panel with full CRUD operations, fairsart branding throughout, sophisticated artisan visual theme with warm earth tones and serif typography, and proper image asset management. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the file evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal requiring users to provide their name before shopping
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify any user profile management or name collection requirement. The checkout flow (REQ-4) only requires customer information collection at checkout time, not beforehand as a mandatory profile setup.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, and saveCallerUserProfile functions
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specifies user profile functionality. REQ-4 only requires collecting customer information during checkout, not maintaining persistent user profiles.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark theme support with ThemeProvider and theme switching capability
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions theme switching or dark mode. REQ-7 specifies a warm earth tone aesthetic but does not request theme toggling functionality.
